rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with open reception area featuring minimalist design and subtle indoor plant arrangements in accordance with Vastu principles.
Modern living room with large windows for ample natural light, minimalist decor that emphasizes clean lines and neutral colors.
Open dining space integrated with the kitchen area. Designed to encourage social interaction and maintain a clutter-free environment.
Functional, state-of-the-art kitchen designed for efficiency with ample storage, integrated appliances, and natural lighting.
Master bedroom featuring a spacious balcony overlooking the living area. Minimalist decor complemented by subtle Vastu-compliant placements of furniture.
Second bedroom with adjoining balcony for private outdoor space and relaxation, designed in minimalist style following local norms.
Third bedroom also featuring a balcony, ensuring privacy and a serene environment.
Modern bathroom with water-efficient fixtures and minimalist finishings, adhering to local building codes.

openings.description: A single large entrance door that faces the auspicious northeast direction as per Vastu principles.
Large windows and glass doors placed to allow maximum natural light while maintaining privacy.

rooms.description: Additional space adjoining the master bedroom for enhanced luxury living; includes a private balcony and meditation area.
Additional extension to second bedroom, providing extra closet or study space.
Extension of the third bedroom with an integrated balcony for personal relaxation.

openings.description: Access points to balconies on each bedroom, ensuring privacy and a serene outlook as per design principles.

rooms.description: Expansive rooftop terrace designed for leisure activities. Features a luxury pergola, seating area, and water features in line with minimalist aesthetics.
